title: Wei Tang's home page
contents: Home  Bio & CV  Publications  Teaching  Services  Team                Wei Tang   Assistant Professor  Department of Computer Science  University of Illinois at Chicago  1141 Science and Engineering Offices 851 S Morgan St (M/C 152) Chicago, IL 60607  Email: tangw at uic dot edu          Multiple Ph.D. openings are available for Fall 2020.  Visiting students/scholars are also welcome. Prospective students please contact Dr. Tang with your resume and transcripts.        Research Interests    Computer Vision  Machine Learning and Pattern Recognition  Human Motion and Action Analysis  Intelligent Human-Computer Interaction  Remote Sensing Image Analysis and Applications
